prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small blue creature with a leafy hat.
Show me a Pokemon with a round body, green foliage, and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a cute aquatic Pokemon that thrives in wetlands and has a vibrant blue color.
Design a Pokemon that has a lily pad on its head and a playful, friendly personality.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that can be found in forests and has a gentle nature.
Give me a Pokemon with a unique combination of water and grass types, perfect for trainers.
Make a small, adorable Pokemon known for its love of water and green surroundings.
